After 1684, the power to create a calendar shifted to the shogunate.Murdoch, James. (1996). A History of Japan, pp. 185-186. The Tokugawa astrology bureau developed a calendar which was independent of Chinese almanacs.Nussbaum, "Jōkyō-reki," p. 431; Fiévé, Nicolas.
